dcterms:creator: A. Khosla

dcterms:description: ModelNet10 is a large-scale collection of mesh surfaces of 10 object categories such as tables and chairs, split into 3991 train examples and 908 test examples. Each of the example meshes is sampled uniformly to produce 1000 points.
dcterms:title: ModelNet10

dcterms:creator: Martin Simonovsky
Nikos Komodakis
dcterms:description: MNIST is a dataset of handwritten digits, where each image can be interpreted as a signal defined over a set of coordinate nodes representing pixel intensity.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Jiaxin Li
Ben M Chen
Gim Hee Lee
dcterms:description: VoxelGrid is an algorithm used for graph coarsening in point cloud data, which helps in creating hierarchical representations for graph neural networks.
dcterms:title: VoxelGrid

dcterms:creator: Haoqiang Fan
Hao Su
Leonidas Guibas
dcterms:description: The Point Cloud dataset is used for 3D object reconstruction from a single image, focusing on generating point sets.
dcterms:title: Point Cloud
